MCSPI_Params_s Struct Reference
SPI Driver » SPI Driver MCSPI API

MCSPI Parameters. More...

#include <MCSPI.h>

Data Fields

SPI_TransferMode transferMode

void * custom
 

Detailed Description

MCSPI Parameters.

MCSPI Parameters are used to with the MCSPI_open() call. Default values for these parameters are set using MCSPI_Params_init().

See also
MCSPI_Params_init()

Field Documentation

uint32_t MCSPI_Params_s::bitRate

SPI bit rate in Hz in single channle mode

void* MCSPI_Params_s::custom

Custom argument used by driver implementation

uint32_t MCSPI_Params_s::dataSize

SPI data frame size in bits in single channle mode

SPI_FrameFormat MCSPI_Params_s::frameFormat

SPI frame format in single channle mode

SPI_Mode MCSPI_Params_s::mode

Master or Slave mode, all the channels on the same instance should have the same mode

MCSPI_CallbackFxn MCSPI_Params_s::transferCallbackFxn

Callback function pointer

SPI_TransferMode MCSPI_Params_s::transferMode

Blocking or Callback mode

uint32_t MCSPI_Params_s::transferTimeout

Transfer timeout in system ticks (Not supported with all implementations
